text.section: The Finance and Administration Cabinet shall not approve investments on which there has ever been a default in payment of principal or interest preceding the date of acceptance by the State Treasurer.
All income from investments credited to the state fire and tornado insurance fund shall be credited to that fund.

law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 25, effective January 1, 2015. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 4636-30, 4636-31.
